org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter
Class InMemoryFormRowHandlerDecorator

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.adapter.InMemoryFormRowHandlerDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormRowHandler, RowHandler, java.io.Serializable
public class InMemoryFormRowHandlerDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements FormRowHandler

Decorator that uses the InMemoryFormListHelper to assign temporary keys to new objects.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
